> LGTM
> BTW, would you please fix the concurrent bug for clientpool mentioned in [2662](https://github.com/apache/iotdb/pull/2662) in this pr?

ok, hi , I alter 2662....

> I try to change nodeClientNumMap.put(node, nodeClientNum + 1); to nodeClientNumMap.computeIfPresent(node, (n, oldValue) -> oldValue + 1); in waitForClient, and change nodeClientNumMap.put(node, nodeClientNum); to nodeClientNumMap.computeIfPresent(node, (n, oldValue) -> oldValue - 1); in putClient, and then I can pass your newly-added concurrent test below. So maybe just change these two line will be enough?

It seems we should change these two places at least, and after these changes we may remove the unused parameter 'NodeClientNum' in some functions, last but not least , maybe we can copy the UT there too.

> > I try to change nodeClientNumMap.put(node, nodeClientNum + 1); to nodeClientNumMap.computeIfPresent(node, (n, oldValue) -> oldValue + 1); in waitForClient, and change nodeClientNumMap.put(node, nodeClientNum); to nodeClientNumMap.computeIfPresent(node, (n, oldValue) -> oldValue - 1); in putClient, and then I can pass your newly-added concurrent test below. So maybe just change these two line will be enough?

hi all,  I submit a new PR  for 2662, this PR need merged first...

Hi, as is discussed in mail list and JIRA, we intend to use `*` and `**`:

We could reference the usage of wild star in Linux :
```
/tmp/* matches any file in /tmp. // Substitutes for any number of characters, except /.
/tmp/** matches all files and directories underneath /tmp. // Substitutes for any number of characters, including /.
```

So we should also consider that `**` also contains zero layer.
For example, if we have some storage groups:
```
root.a.sg1
root.a.b.sg2
root.b.sg3
```
For "delete storage group root.a", we do not delete any sg.
For "delete storage group root.a.\*" we delete root.a.sg1
For "delete storage group root.a.sg1.\*" we do not delete any sg.
For "delete storage group root.a.\*\*" we delete root.a.sg1, root.a.b.sg2

If we also have another storage group `root.a`:

For "delete storage group root.a", we delete root.a
For "delete storage group root.a.*" we delete root.a.sg1 (because * does not include zero layer)
For "delete storage group root.a.**" we delete  root.a, root.a.sg1, root.a.b.sg2  (because ** includes zero layer)

I have a solution to the problem of forgetting to modify the version in the java file
We can automatically generate a version number file based on the version of the pom file
The reference information is as follows
https://my.oschina.net/zhongwenhao/blog/4945383

If we can get the version information in the development environment, it can be used for later version upgrades, such as version verification, etc.

您好，根据您的描述，测试时是按照 #2595 所说关闭了`enable_mem_control`的选项是吗？只有关闭了这个选项memtable_size_threshold 的设置才会生效。

此外，修改memtable_size_threshold时必须要写成实际的数字，带M时暂时是不会正确识别，仍然为默认值256MB。另外，针对这个场景，还建议将primitive_array_size调整为32或者16。

根据您的描述场景，总共有20,000 * 500 = 1千万个传感器。当前的0.11和master版本的元数据存储模式可能对这个场景不太友好。目前我们正在进行这方面的优化工作，0.12正式版本发布后会对这种超多传感器的场景进行大幅优化，可以尽情期待一下。

> 您好，根据您的描述，测试时是按照 #2595 所说关闭了`enable_mem_control`的选项是吗？只有关闭了这个选项memtable_size_threshold 的设置才会生效。

**测试过enable_mem_control位true时和false时，设置memtable_size_threshold时，上述变量改为false了。**
> 
> 此外，修改memtable_size_threshold时必须要写成实际的数字，带M时暂时是不会正确识别，仍然为默认值256MB。另外，针对这个场景，还建议将primitive_array_size调整为32或者16。

**10M时写的是10737418。**
> 
> 根据您的描述场景，总共有20,000 * 500 = 1千万个传感器。当前的0.11和master版本的元数据存储模式可能对这个场景不太友好。目前我们正在进行这方面的优化工作，0.12正式版本发布后会对这种超多传感器的场景进行大幅优化，可以尽情期待一下。

**master上现在和没合并这个改进吧？0.12预估什么时候能发布？**

> 修改primitive_array_size为16后，还是报错

哦，这个就是由于内存不足，传感器过多导致无法注册新序列导致的。跟 #2595的情况不太一样。

如果要在16G的机器上使用现在版本支持这个场景，建议将write_read_schema_free_memory_proportion里schema的比例调大一些，可以试试 3:2:3:2。

> master上现在和没合并这个改进吧？0.12预估什么时候能发布？

对，这个现在还正在开发中。大概3、4周左右应该就可以了。

Hi, it may be because current binary thrift compiler is generated on Ubuntu. 
Maybe you can install thrift (v0.13) yourself by using `yum`.
Then, use 
```
mvn -DskipTests clean package \ 
-Dthrift.download-url=http://apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt \
-Dthrift.exec.absolute.path=<YOUR LOCAL THRIFT BINARY FILE>
```
